pullrequest.title: Refactoring the cmake scripts to use ignition-cmake

content.raw: `ignition/common/Export.hh` essentially exists for internal use (but it needs to be installed because of how headers work). If it needs to be used, then it will be included by whichever `ignition/common` header needs it. In the event that no `ignition/common` header needs it, then the user will not have any use for it either.
content.html: ignition/common/Export.hh essentially exists for internal use (but it needs to be installed because of how headers work). If it needs to be used, then it will be included by whichever ignition/common header needs it. In the event that no ignition/common header needs it, then the user will not have any use for it either.
